name: Shepherd Dog
description:
You take the role of a trusty shepherd dog, that has to herd all animals back to their pens. 

* Herd sheep, chickens and pigs into their enclosures

* Roam through 9 levels of pleasant scenery

* Collect all 9 lost items and unlock a secret farm area

* 11 music tracks 

  

HOW TO PLAY:

* navigate your dog by holding the mouse

* direct sheep to the wooden pens on each map

* chickens only go inside chicken coops and pigs only go inside pens with a distinct dirt inside

* exit a level by running inside the dog house

The gameplay is pleasant and cozy. Finishing the levels is not urgent at all. You can just run around and chill if that's what you want to do.
